message: Who those women are,

name: Voice
message: It's not just that I killed them！

message: Who did all of that？

name: Voice
message: You remembered, Jonathan Swift！
Looks like it's inside the cathedral of the monastery.
The faint light of early morning pours into the spacious room through the stained glass.
I watch as fine dust dances in the sunlight, and the moisture that had condensed on the walls and floor warms up, melting into the air like ice melting away.
The snow that had kept falling until last night seemed to have stopped after midnight, and because of the piled-up snow, the air around is shockingly cold.
The nuns huddle together in front of the large window carved into the Cathedral wall, seeking a bit of sunlight, and seem to be talking about something.
Only fragmented snippets of those conversations reach my ears.
Inside the spacious cathedral that offers a view of every corner, there’s no one else besides a handful of nuns.
Even so, as if they were pathologically afraid of being overheard, they deliberately lower their voices, huddle together, and gossip about something.
『You guys, have you seen it yet？ It's happening again......』
『Again? But someone just came from another place yesterday, didn't they?』
『I heard those people are spies working under the cardinal.』
『Saying that won't change anything.』
『I just went and saw it.』
『Who is it this time？』
『I didn't see it up close or anything, but... apparently it was Hannah.』
『Isn't Hannah the girl who went missing about half a year ago？』
『I'm scared......I wonder who's next.』
『I wonder how long this kind of thing is going to keep up...........』
The girl lying in the snow doesn't move a muscle, just like a Doll, and her vacant eyes aren't seeing anything.
It was probably thrown away sometime last night. Because of the cold, all the blood had left the body long ago, and the bare skin was way whiter than the blood-stained snow around it.
But she probably doesn’t even feel the cold anymore, and she doesn’t care at all about the chill of the snow touching her bare skin.
That nun was already dead.
Something like a rope was used to strangle her neck, and the marks left from the congestion are clear like a collar used to leash an animal.
The scars all over the body are definitely evidence of assault.
鞭で叩かれた跡と思われる擦過傷と、鋭利な刃物でつけられたあまり深くない切り傷が皮膚の上に無数に点在している。
か細い足首には鉄と皮で作られた足枷の一部がそのまま残り、ひどく暴れたのだろう、周囲の皮膚が擦りむけ、うっすらと血を滲ませている。
The iron chain extending from the leg irons looks like it was cut by something that could sever a thick iron chain, like an axe or something similar.
The sight of her legs, still bound in shackles and exposed all the way to her most private parts as they’re thrown out into the snow, would make any modest woman want to shrink away in shame.
Of course, she who has already passed away can't do anything like that. The way she's been thrown out into the snow is even kind of erotic.
生気を失って虚空を見つめる彼女のその表情は、生前の彼女の姿を知らない私には一層美しく感じられる。
The girl with pure white skin lying in the snow, tinted light pink by her own blood, looks like a carefully crafted work of art.
I was shocked at myself for thinking such things.
Back then, just seeing a corpse would make me feel so sad...
What the heck happened to me......

name: Lushion
message: 絞殺の跡がはっきり残っているのに、顔には苦しんだ　　　　　　　　様子が全くない。サラ、これはどういう事かしら？

name: Sarah
message: That means... she was strangled after she died...
Or did you maybe use some kind of drug...?

name: Lushion
message: If they were already dead before being strangled, then marks like this　　　　　　　　wouldn't be left. Also‥‥‥

name: Lushion
message: Look, see? My teeth are kind of reddish, right?
This is what a body strangled to death looks like.

name: Sarah
message: Lushion-sama......
Even　so......this　is　just　too　much.
To throw me away in the cold snow...

name: Lushion
message: With this, there's no way to tell when or where she was killed.　　　　　　　　The signs of abuse inflicted on her show wildly twisted lust,　　　　　　　　but...

name: Lushion
message: Whoever dumped the corpse here must be terrifyingly calm and incredibly intelligent.

name: Sarah
message: リュション様‥‥‥みたいに？

name: Lushion
message: Sarah.

name: Sarah
message: I'm sorry... but doing it like this is just too cruel.
This is an act of desecrating the dead.

name: Lushion
message: The snow's been falling nonstop for a while now, so the killer could've dumped the body whenever they wanted. But they picked last night.
What big thing happened yesterday at this monastery？

name: Sarah
message: ...We arrived.

name: Lushion
message: On the other side of the monastery, the rough sea is right there—if I threw it in, they’d never find the body...

name: Lushion
message: But the culprit chose this place, even though they'll be found right away come morning. Sarah, what do you make of this？
Sarah and Lushion are kneeling on the snow, having a hushed conversation while the other nuns watch from a distance.
The way they're having such an intense conversation in front of a completely naked corpse is so far removed from anything I can imagine, it just looks insane.

name: Lushion
message: There are wounds all over my body.........
Some of them are pretty old. Especially the parts where the shackles were attached, they're festering and starting to fall apart.
サラ、ここから何が判るかしら？

name: Sarah
message: I was locked up for a really long time...
ではこの傷も刃物で切られた痕でしょうか？

name: Lushion
message: This is......

name: Sarah
message: What is it？

name: Lushion
message: Take a look at your belly.
There are a lot of other little scratch-like things too, right？

name: Sarah
message: Isn't that just a healing cut？

name: Lushion
message: That's not it.
These are... stretch marks from pregnancy.

name: Sarah
message: What's that supposed to mean?

name: Lushion
message: つまりね、お腹の中で赤ちゃんが大きくなると、当然　　　　　　　　母親のお腹もふくれるでしょう？

name: Lushion
message: Because my skin is stretching from my swollen belly, it's getting torn.
It's a bit different from a cut, but kind of similar.

name: Sarah
message: But there's no way a nun could get pregnant with a baby.
That goes against God's teachings！

name: Lushion
message: Yeah......
Let's pray for her.
There was a man watching the two kneeling in front of the corpse, from the shadows of nuns standing at a distance.
Without even showing any sign of being there, even the nuns around don't seem to notice that someone is standing there......
To the nuns, that man was like air itself.
While the man pretends to be indifferent, his eyes stay fixed on Sarah and Lushion without so much as a twitch.
It's already shocking enough that there's a man inside the Monastery where men are supposed to be forbidden, but on top of that, I felt like something evil was emanating from his body.

name: Angelica
message: Pietro-sama......

name: Pietro
message: Angelica, huh.
I told you not to come near me in front of others.
Those two, they're spies sent by the cardinal, or so I hear.

name: Angelica
message: If we just leave them alone, it might get troublesome, you know.

name: Pietro
message: Don't worry.
There's no way those guys will leave this place alive.

name: Angelica
message: Then......

name: Pietro
message: An older woman makes just the right prey, don't you think?
Looks like the girl hasn't even become a woman yet. It's been a while, so I think I'll have some fun for a change.

name: Angelica
message: And what will you do after that？
We can't just leave them inside the place.

name: Pietro
message: Hmph, they'll make fine food for the beasts.
A single young girl won't even leave a bone behind.
Looks like it's inside the Cathedral.
It seems to be during mass, and the nuns are offering prayers.

A low male voice echoes off the stone walls, resounding all around. Among the nuns bowing their heads deeply in prayer, Sarah's small figure stands out. Her cheeks, red from the outdoor cold, are even streaked with tears as she prays.

But standing beside him, Lushion stares intently at the man on the altar performing the mass, not moving a muscle. He doesn’t join in reciting the prayer, and his lips are pressed together so tightly they've lost all color.

name: Lushion
message: If a black person became a priest in England,
There's no way this wouldn't make the news.

name: Lushion
message: If my memory serves me right, there was nothing in the official records either.
Is this monastery being guided by a priest from another sect？

name: Sarah
message: 《...That poor Hannah...
...They looked really cold...

name: Lushion
message: Even with just that, it's more than enough for a cardinal to step in,
What are you thinking... Maria...

name: Sarah
message: 《...Lushion said I was pregnant, but I wonder what happened to the baby...》

name: Lushion
message: That face Maria made........
It feels like I'm being forced to go through some kind of ordeal.

name: Lushion
message: But compared to that, Angelica's face......

name: Sarah
message: (...No way, before even receiving baptism...)

name: Lushion
message: This is definitely not normal.
There's no doubt that those people are sharing a secret.

name: Sarah
message: 《No, there's no way God would allow something like that！》

name: Lushion
message: And you're showing that off to me.........

name: Sarah
message: 《God, please... bring peace to Hannah's soul...
And please protect her baby...

name: Lushion
message: Sarah, you can stop praying now. This mass is a little weird.　　　　　　　　Did you notice？ Take a good look.

name: Sarah
message: ...This isn't a funeral, huh... Poor Hannah.

name: Lushion
message: Sarah... I also think that your best quality is your kind heart. But letting your emotions take over isn’t good. You understand what it is we have to do, right？

name: Sarah
message: Yeah.

name: Lushion
message: But yeah, it's weird not to hold a funeral when someone has definitely died, right? I wonder why that is‥‥‥
Did you notice anything else？

name: Sarah
message: It's pretty rare to see a black priest, isn't it? It's the first time I've seen one.
And Maria... is she not feeling well or something？　　　　　She looked so pale...

name: Lushion
message: There shouldn't be any Black Catholic priests in this region.　　　　　　　　If that's the case, then there's a possibility this isn't a mass dedicated to our Lord.

name: Sarah
message: Lushion-sama, no way！

name: Lushion
message: Whatever she's doing, it's not what Maria really wants—it's more like Angelica is forcing her, isn't it.

name: Lushion
message: It's probably impossible for someone as young as you to figure out their relationship just from their expressions.
That expressionless fake priest is even more so...

name: Sarah
message: But it sounds like there are other men in this clinic too.
ピエトロという人で、海の事故で身体の自由を失ったとか。

name: Sarah
message: それで、この修道院の下働きをしているそうです。

name: Lushion
message: What did you say.
Is that guy just wandering around the hospital doing whatever he wants？

name: Sarah
message: With a body that can't move, you won't be able to do anything, will you?
Isn't　there　nothing　wrong　with　it？

name: Lushion
message: What am I doing... Sarah, do you already know things you shouldn't need to know yet...？ Then you get it, right.

name: Lushion
message: That female corpse showed signs of being pregnant.
You can't get pregnant with just women.

name: Sarah
message: Are you going to look into Sister Angelica？

name: Lushion
message: That's pointless. Angelica's always been a sharp woman since forever.

name: Lushion
message: More importantly, it’d be easier to make Maria spill the beans.

name: Sarah
message: Well then.........

name: Lushion
message: Let's try meeting just the two of us, Maria.
Looks like I'll finish up my work at this clinic faster than I thought.

name: Black priest
message: What are you planning to do？
This　isn't　gonna　turn　into　a　pain,　is　it?

name: Pietro
message: Don't worry.
What　could　a　woman　like　her　even　do?

name: Black priest
message: Are you sure it's okay to be so relaxed about this?
Even after causing this many casualties, the experiment still hasn't succeeded, right？

name: Pietro
message: He's actually a pretty timid guy.
That's pretty different from what my cousin told me.

name: Black priest
message: You're just the one who's not normal.
To　think　of　something　like　this,　it's　almost　devilish.

name: Pietro
message: To hear that coming from your mouth, huh.
From you, a non-human monster.
It looks like the director's office where the two were first led when they came to the convent.
The nun superior called Maria is sitting at the desk with her head down, silent.
Lushion is bending over her, pressing down almost on top of her head, whispering something into Maria's ear.

name: Lushion
message: It's true, just like you said, I'm a secret agent for the Cardinal.　　　　　　　　And knowing there was something shady going on here, I　　　　　　　　came to this place.

name: Lushion
message: どうかお話し下さい、シスター・マリア。

name: Lushion
message: Maria... it's better if I just tell you everything now！
I know Angelica is threatening you and forcing you to help her, right？

name: Lushion
message: The cardinal won't blame you either.
Come on, tell me everything.

name: Maria
message: ...I'm not worried about myself.
I don't want to be treated like a fool, not even by you.

name: Lushion
message: I know that much...
But if things stay like this, it's only going to get worse.

name: Lushion
message: Even with my power and the Cardinal's, there's nothing we could do, you know？　　　　　　　　If it comes to that, it won't just be a problem for this institution.

name: Lushion
message: マリア！

name: Maria
message: You still hate me, don't you？
It's been more than ten years since then, but you still haven't forgotten.

name: Lushion
message: What are you talking about？
Right　now,　stuff　like　that　doesn't　matter,　does　it?

name: Maria
message: It's not 'whatever' to me.
You　probably　have　no　idea　how　much　I've　suffered　since　I　reported　you‥‥‥‥

name: Lushion
message: Get a grip already！
Yeah,　that's　right...　I　still　hate　you　even　now！

name: Lushion
message: Of course, right？
If you hadn’t snitched back then......

name: Lushion
message: I quit being a nun a long time ago.
If only I’d had the baby back then.

name: Maria
message: Ah, Lushion......

name: Lushion
message: Do you have any idea what it means to be pregnant with a child？
For half a year, the child I cherished and raised inside my own womb...

name: Lushion
message: Why do you say you have to get an abortion？
I beat Angelica.

name: Lushion
message: My only dream was to bear the High Priest's child and become his wife！

name: Maria
message: ......You won't forgive me, huh.

name: Lushion
message: Yeah, I won't forgive you！
I'll probably never forget about you.

name: Lushion
message: Just say it, Maria.
What's going on in this institute?

name: Maria
message: No... You were still able to abort your baby, but... the ones made inside this facility...

name: Lushion
message: Are you saying I can't get rid of it anymore？
We've come to a point of no return.

name: Maria
message: That's right.
If it comes down to begging for my life, I'd rather die here along with this facility.

name: Lushion
message: Got it.
I can't save you anymore.

name: Maria
message: You should leave this place right now, together with that girl.                If you don't......

name: Lushion
message: I've had enough of your nonsense.

name: Lushion
message: Excuse me, Sister Maria......
